name: P.J.'s Chair - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 1998, P.J.'s Chair represents a modern reinterpretation of the classic chair archetype, accentuated with minimalist design elements. This chair is meticulously crafted from solid American walnut wood, highlighting fine craftsmanship. Its design features a slim, curvilinear backrest crafted from a single piece of thick wood, giving it both aesthetic appeal and structural integrity. The chair is available with a padded seat that can be upholstered in fabric, leather, or natural leather, integrated seamlessly with the curved poplar plywood on top and walnut wood on the bottom, ensuring both comfort and style.
